name: Raymond Pringle's Quest for the Fabled Jar of Pickled Cabbage
description:
Raymond Pringle's Quest for the Fabled Jar of Pickled Cabbage is a humorous text adventure.

The title of this game leaves nothing to the imagination. The player is Raymond. Raymond lives in a grotty little hole of a place and goes looking for the eponymous condiment. Along the way Raymond will need to use one, some or all of the following; a halibut; a whistle; aftershave and a bazooka, though not necessarily all at once or in that order, all of which sums up the game and the humour that can be expected pretty well.

This game was developed using Professional Adventure Writer. It supports the standard shortcuts such as N/S/E/W for North/South/East/West as well X for EXAMINE. When completed correctly the player's final score should be 100%.

shot.caption: The start of the game. unlike many games from Zenobi/Delbert The Hamster this game does not have any form of introduction or screen to lay out the backstory
